Title: Abraham model enthalpy of solvation correlations for solutes dissolved in 1-alkanol solvents (C4–C6)
Abstract: © 2015 Taylor & Francis.Experimental data have been compiled from the published literature pertaining to enthalpies of solvation of inorganic gases and organic solutes dissolved in 1-butanol, 1-pentanol and 1-hexanol at 298 K. It is shown that the Abraham model can be used to satisfactorily correlate the measured enthalpies of solvation in 1-butanol, 1-pentanol and 1-hexanol to within standard deviations of 2.86 kJ/mole for 131 data points, 2.67 kJ/mole for 92 data points and 2.89 kJ/mole for 84 data points, respectively. The derived equations were validated by training set and test set analyses.
